munadi
Utility
Munadi - Simple Athan App.
Features:
Prayer times for almost any city
Light and free from advertisements
Hijri and Georgian date, adjustable
Ability to select your preferred Madhab
Ability to adjust prayer time +/- manually
Ability to enable, mute or adjust Athan volume
Choose from 10 different popular calculation methods
Main page https://gitlab.com/munadi/munadi/raw/master/screenshots/1702/main_page.png
Location search https://gitlab.com/munadi/munadi/raw/master/screenshots/1702/location_search.png
Settings page https://gitlab.com/munadi/munadi/raw/master/screenshots/1702/settings_page.png
This release added requested features made by many of you, some features were removed, and of course some UI enhancements:
Brand new UI, using the latest and greatest from Qt
You can now toggle between Hijri date and Miladi
Mundadi will use system's proxy by default
Munadi is now almost three times lighter!
Date can now go forward and backwards
Removed Iqama functionality, sorry!
Added keyboard shortcuts, see help
Many issues fixed
There are many exciting changes in this release, including changes to the user interface, functionality, speed and many more, see below:
Iqama Time (Experimental):
Get Iqama time from any Mosque
Add Mosques to your favourite
Add Mosques to Munadi's datase
Add monthly timetable to any Mosque
Edit Mosque's details
Edit Mosque's timetable
Note: Please be responsible, we can't validate every Mosque out there
User Interface:
Added animation
Changed font and colour
Everything should be speedier
Other changes:
Integrated help
Automatically detect DST
New calculation methods
You now search for your city instead of menu selection
Many other changes behind the scenes
